message:
need a good performance android mobile to handle about 5000 contacts, few business applications, video recordings, no games.
any suggestions ?!!!
did anyone try Nexsus before ?

data.message: I just got Moto g 2nd gen, and it is very smooth for such needs with very affordable price
Nexus is the best device I ever used

I don't see any special requirements in what you say. I bet even a Galaxy S3 might do. If you do video recording, it'll help buying an expensive class 10 microSIM with high write speed. Nexus will not allow that but you might be OK with big internal storage.
my major requirements is to handle the 5000 contacts without any performance degradation. some with S4 told me that he had contacts less than mine, and he had an issue in the performance !
This sounds weird. Do they store them on SIM? I have so many contacts as Google contacts and it's fine (S1 & S4)

5000 contact is nothing. Android has contacts app that Sync your contacts to your Gmail I have over 12K contact and it's just fine. it doesn't affect processing or Ram Memory at all. go for Nexus, Samsung or iPhone any of them will not give you issues on what you need.
